name: Monument Builders: Cathedral Rising
description:
In this beautifully designed construction strategy game, you build the Cologne Cathedral, the landmark, symbol and UNESCO world heritage site in the heart of Cologne.

Embark on a journey into the past with the Brothers Grimm and experience the exciting history of the building along with a romantic fairytale world in the tried and true Monument Builders style, full of funny characters and dialogs.

Build the world-famous cathedral that has defined the Cologne skyline for centuries and that remains the symbol of the city on the Rhine to this day! Do you have what it takes to be the best Monument Builder of all time?

You can play Monument Builders: Cathedral Rising on the following devices:
- iPhone 4, 4s, 5, 5s, 5c, 6, 6 Plus
- iPad 2, 3, 4, mini, mini 2, air
- iPod touch 4, 5


Features:

• New part in the successful Monument Builders series!
• Build the famous landmark that makes the city of Cologne so unique!
• Wonderful mix of fact and fiction!
• Lovingly detailed graphics with an atmospheric soundtrack!
• Hours of gaming fun with 5 regions and 50 challenging levels!
